title: Lvl 1 Spells
content: crab. Its sharp pincers can slow enemies. (Lasts until the end of a long rest) Range: 18m Wizard Find Familiar: Frog Conjuration ActionLevel 1 Spell Slot No Summon a familiar with the form and statistics of a frog. Its skin is covered with dizzying toxins.(Lasts until the end of a long rest) Range: 18m Wizard Find Familiar: Imp Conjuration ActionLevel 1 Spell Slot No Summon a familiar with the form and statistics of an imp. Its barbed tail can inject enemies with a potent poison. Range: 18m Warl
